statements: SELECT * FROM ProfessionalDevelopmentRecords
SELECT staff_name, training_date FROM ProfessionalDevelopmentRecords ORDER BY training_date DESC
SELECT staff_name FROM ProfessionalDevelopmentRecords WHERE certification_status = TRUE
SELECT staff_name, training_date FROM ProfessionalDevelopmentRecords WHERE staff_name = 'John Doe'
SELECT record_id FROM ProfessionalDevelopmentRecords WHERE certification_status = FALSE
SELECT * FROM ProfessionalDevelopmentRecords WHERE certification_status = TRUE ORDER BY training_date DESC
SELECT staff_name, training_date FROM ProfessionalDevelopmentRecords WHERE staff_name = 'John Doe'
SELECT * FROM ProfessionalDevelopmentRecords WHERE staff_name LIKE '%Smith%' AND certification_status = TRUE
SELECT staff_name, training_date FROM ProfessionalDevelopmentRecords ORDER BY staff_name ASC, training_date DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ProfessionalDevelopmentRecords
SELECT * FROM professional_development_records;
SELECT staff_id, training_session, training_date FROM professional_development_records WHERE certification_status = TRUE;
SELECT certification_name, certification_date FROM staff_certification WHERE staff_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM professional_development_records WHERE training_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT staff_id, certification_name FROM staff_certification ORDER BY certification_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM professional_development_records WHERE staff_id = 1;
SELECT training_session, training_date FROM professional_development_records WHERE certification_status = TRUE;
SELECT staff_id, certification_name FROM staff_certification WHERE expiration_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT certification_id, certification_name, certification_date FROM staff_certification WHERE certification_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2022-01-01';
SELECT staff_id, training_session, certification_name FROM professional_development_records JOIN staff_certification ON professional_development_records.staff_id = staff_certification.staff_id;
SELECT * FROM staff_training;
SELECT staff_name, training_subject FROM staff_training WHERE training_date = '2022-09-15';
SELECT staff_name, training_date FROM staff_training ORDER BY training_date DESC;
SELECT certification_name, certification_date FROM certification_tracking WHERE staff_id = 123;
SELECT resource_name, resource_link FROM training_resources WHERE resource_type = 'Video';
SELECT * FROM staff_training;
SELECT staff_name, training_subject FROM staff_training WHERE training_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT certification_name, certification_date FROM certification_tracking ORDER BY certification_date DESC;
SELECT staff_name, training_date, training_subject FROM staff_training WHERE staff_id = 3;
SELECT resource_name, resource_type, resource_link FROM training_resources WHERE resource_type = 'video';
SELECT * FROM ProfessionalDevelopmentRecords WHERE certification_status = true;
SELECT staff_id, training_type FROM ProfessionalDevelopmentRecords WHERE training_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT course_name, course_duration FROM TrainingCourses ORDER BY course_duration DESC;
SELECT staff_id, staff_name, department FROM StaffInformation WHERE position = 'Manager';
SELECT staff_id, certification_expiry_date FROM CertificationStatus WHERE completion_date IS NOT NULL;
SELECT staff_id, staff_name, department FROM StaffInformation WHERE position = 'Manager';
SELECT staff_id, staff_name, position, department FROM StaffInformation ORDER BY staff_name DESC;
SELECT staff_id, course_name, course_description, course_duration FROM TrainingCourses WHERE course_duration > 5;
SELECT staff_id, training_type, training_date FROM ProfessionalDevelopmentRecords WHERE certification_status = TRUE ORDER BY training_date ASC;

SELECT s.staff_name, c.course_name, cs.completion_date FROM StaffInformation s INNER JOIN TrainingCourses c ON s.staff_id = c.course_id INNER JOIN CertificationStatus cs ON s.staff_id = cs.staff_id ORDER BY cs.completion_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM special_education_staff;
SELECT staff_id, staff_name FROM special_education_staff ORDER BY staff_name DESC;
SELECT certification_status, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM special_education_staff GROUP BY certification_status;
SELECT * FROM training_records WHERE training_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT staff_name, certification_date, certification_type FROM special_education_staff JOIN certification_logs ON special_education_staff.staff_id = certification_logs.staff_id;
SELECT * FROM special_education_staff ORDER BY staff_id DESC;
SELECT staff_name, certification_status FROM special_education_staff WHERE certification_status='Certified';

SELECT staff_name, training_topic FROM special_education_staff JOIN training_records ON special_education_staff.staff_id = training_records.staff_id WHERE training_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';

SELECT staff_name, certification_type, certification_date FROM special_education_staff JOIN certification_logs ON special_education_staff.staff_id = certification_logs.staff_id ORDER BY certification_date ASC;

SELECT staff_name, training_materials.material_name, assigned_date FROM special_education_staff JOIN training_assignments ON special_education_staff.staff_id = training_assignments.staff_id JOIN training_materials ON training_assignments.material_id = training_materials.material_id WHERE assigned_date >= '2022-01-01';
